title: Neyrobatya
overview: Neurotic IT specialist Grisha creates a unique neural network capable of transferring human consciousness into "smart" devices. But he has to test his unique invention on his own father. Bes, the leader of a criminal organized crime group, ends up literally in his son's hands, moving from gadget to gadget. They embark on a crazy adventure that will help them rethink their attitudes towards each other.
